aboutUsPrimaryText: PT. Sentosa Eka Perdana Prima (SEPP) is a chemical manufacturing and distribution company focused on providing high-quality solutions for various industries. Our portfolio includes chemicals, natural resources, and products that support the oil and gas sector. With over 100 products, such as amines, diols, polyalcohols, acids, and more, we are committed to meeting customer needs through efficient production and distribution. Additionally, we provide consultation services and tailored solutions to help improve product efficiency according to customer requirements. By maintaining high-quality standards and prioritizing customer satisfaction, we continuously strive to be a reliable partner in fulfilling industrial needs and delivering the best results.
